definitions: in a way that involves detailed knowledge

examples.text: everyone knew intimately what was going on
he is intimately familiar with her work

shortDefinitions: in way that involves detailed knowledge

definitions: in a way that involves a close link or relationship

examples.text: themes of love and death were intimately connected

shortDefinitions: in way that involves close link or relationship

definitions: in a private and personal way

examples.text: the pair laughed and talked intimately
a fear of being touched intimately
